overview:
Co-Founder & CEO at MySpareBrain. Entrepreneur, adventurer and family man.

Steve is a passionate technology entrepreneur who enjoys and excels at working with companies large and small to build great products.

As a startup founder, Steve is devoted to his vision for a world where people’s lives are enriched and simplified by a better management of information.

Steve invests in people and technology, with a number of personal projects including Fidgetstick - a community for adventurous people, Ruplay - mobile music applications for children and parents and Spot The Ball - a low stake high reward game that’s fun and addictive.

As with any great entrepreneur, Steve has both experience and skill in multiple areas, from project management and operations, customer service and account management, sales and business development, marketing and social media, accounts and finance - and uses these skills for his own startups and to help other companies improve and achieve their potential.
